summary: The Defense Industry Pricing Transparency Act (H.R. 5176) mandates reporting of significant price increases for defense contracts. It requires offerors to notify the contracting officer within 30 days when the price of a product or service exceeds specified thresholds, based on the original bid price or prior government payments. Non-compliance results in the inclusion of information about the offeror in the Federal Awardee Performance and Integrity Information System.
